description:
Aspose.Pdf for .NET is a PDF document creation and manipulation component that enables your .NET applications to read, write and manipulate existing PDF documents without using Adobe Acrobat. It also allows you to create forms and manage form fields embedded in a PDF document. This component is written in managed C# and it allows developers to add PDF creation and manipulation functionality to their Microsoft .NET applications (WinForms, ASP.NET and .NET Compact Framework).
        Aspose.Pdf for .NET is affordable and offers an incredible wealth of features including PDF compression options; table creation and manipulation; support for graph objects; extensive hyperlink functionality; extended security controls; custom font handling; integration with data sources; add or remove bookmarks; create table of contents; add, update, delete attachments and annotations; import or export PDF form data; add, replace or remove text and images; split, concatenate, extract or inset pages; transform pages to image; print PDF documents and much more.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	
Features
PDFNET-41880	Add a row containing some text at the end of page if table is broken in two pages

Enhancements
PDFNET-42076	Set link to Footnore
PDFNET-42050	Reference to Newtonsoft 9.0.0.0 in Aspose.Pdf for .NET dll
PDFNET-41507	Opacity property support in WatermarkAnnotaiton

Bugs
PDFNET-41902	PDF to PDFA: after conversion some content is missed
PDFNET-41151	HTML to PDF: resource file is not working from network folder
PDFNET-41907	The conversion process of document takes 45 seconds and it grows to more than 11MB in size
PDFNET-41742	Aspose PDF Memory Leak when use LocalHyperlinks
PDFNET-41455	PDF to PDF/A - Problems with the order of objects on certain pages
PDFNET-42054	Input stream must be FileStream exception when loading Tex file from stream
PDFNET-41910	Wrong output - Problem with transparency, the pages are cut into rectangles.
PDFNET-41092	PDF to PDFA problem with transparent images after conversion
PDFNET-40490	PDF to PDFA conversion generates a very large file in size
PDFNET-41528	PDF to PDF/A - Missing logo and non compliance output
PDFNET-41527	PDF to PDF/A - Resultant file gets corrupted
PDFNET-41272	PDF/A-1 conversion creates invalid XRef table
PDFNET-41103	PDF to PDF/A - Wordart glyph are incorrectly converted
PDFNET-41083	Flatten method overlapps PDF file contents
PDFNET-40882	PDF to PDF/A_1b - Resultant file is not compliant
PDFNET-40586	PDF to PDF - Image is removed from document
PDFNET-40316	Flatten form field removes dropdown values
PDFNET-40246	HTML to PDF - Image not being loaded from network path
PDFNET-41863	Replaceable symbols not working in Page body
PDFNET-41508	Text is cut off when adding artifact or annotation watermark to PDF
PDFNET-40874	PDF to HTML: links render as plain text
PDFNET-42077	Table header not being grouped with first row
PDFNET-41587	PDF to DOC: Table headers are disappeared
PDFNET-41384	ComboBoxField value is not preserved when calling flatten() method
PDFNET-41334	When converting HTML to PDF, DIV elements in produced PDF not consistent
PDFNET-36012	PDF to DOCX conversion loses formatting
summary: Aspose.Pdf for .NET is an amazing component which provides the feature to create and manipulate PDF documents.
title: Aspose.Pdf for .NET
